definition: Pearson (family name as well as various places)

sentences.english: That, Lardy at the Peterson Institute said, gives the country unusual power.
sentences.chinese: 皮爾森研究所的拉迪說，該國擁有不同尋常的力量。

sentences.english: There was a railroad viaduct in Pilsen that was rumored to be haunted.
sentences.chinese: 皮爾森有一座鐵路高架橋，傳說常常鬧鬼。

sentences.english: They are ideally served in tall and slender pilsner glasses.
sentences.chinese: 細高的皮爾森酒杯是盛放它的理想容器。

sentences.english: But for Brant Pierson things aren't quite as tight.
sentences.chinese: 但是在布蘭特皮爾森看來，事情並不那麼糟。

sentences.english: Pearson also predicts a breakthrough in computer-human links.
sentences.chinese: 皮爾森還預測了人機連接中一次大的突破。
